Content:
{
  "schemaVersion": "2.2",
  "description": "Command Document Example JSON Template",
  "parameters": {
    "Instance": {
      "type": "String",
      "description": "The IIS App Pool",
      "default": "COSA"
    },
    "DesiredState": {
      "type": "String",
      "description": "The desired state for the App Pool - Stopped or Started",
      "default": "Started"
    }
  },
  "mainSteps": [
    {
      "action": "aws:runPowerShellScript",
      "name": "example",
      "inputs": {
        "runCommand": [
          "$theComputer = get-content env:computername",
          "Write-Output \"The EC2 Instance to process is: ${theComputer}\"",
          "$instance = \"ACRA\"",
          "$instance = \"{{Instance}}\"",
          "Write-Output \"The App Pool to process is: ${instance}\"",
          "$desiredState = \"Stopped\"",
          "$desiredState = \"{{DesiredState}}\"",
          "Write-Output \"The Desired App Pool State is: ${desiredState}\"",
          "$sleepSeconds = 1",
          "$sleepCount = 15",
          "$remoteScriptVal = New-Object 'System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary[String,object]'",
          "If ((Get-IISAppPool $instance)){ ",
             "$currentState = (Get-IISAppPool $instance) | Select -ExpandProperty State",
             "Write-Output \"AppPool: ${instance} has a current state of ${currentState}\"",
             "if((Get-WebAppPoolState -Name $instance).Value -ne $desiredState) {",
                "if ($desiredState -eq \"stopped\") {",
                   "Stop-WebAppPool -Name $instance",
                   "Write-Output \"AppPool: ${instance} has been requested to Stop\"",
                "} else {",
                   "start-WebAppPool -Name $instance",
                   "Write-Output \"AppPool: ${instance} has been requested to Start\"",
                "}",
                "$counter = 0",
                "$currentState = (Get-IISAppPool $instance) | Select -ExpandProperty State",
                ":myLabel while($currentState -ne $desiredState)",
                "{",
                   "if ($counter -ge $sleepCount) {",
                       "Write-Output \"AppPool: ${instance} did NOT complete successfully with a state of ${currentState} and a desired state of ${desiredState}\"",
                       "$remoteScriptVal.Add(\"ReturnCode\",\"2-Warning\")",
                       "$remoteScriptVal.Add(\"ReturnText\",\"Warning AppPool: ${instance} did NOT complete successfully with a state of ${currentState} and a desired state of ${desiredState}\")",
                       "break myLabel",
                   "}",
                   "Start-Sleep -Seconds $sleepSeconds",
                   "Write-Output \"AppPool: ${instance} ... still working with a state of ${currentState} and a desired state of ${desiredState}\"",
                   "$currentState = (Get-IISAppPool $instance) | Select -ExpandProperty State",
                   "$counter = $counter + 1",
                "}",
                "if ($currentState -eq $desiredState) {",
                   "Write-Output \"AppPool: ${instance} completed successfully and has a state of ${currentState}\"",
                   "$remoteScriptVal.Add(\"ReturnCode\",\"1-Good\")",
                   "$remoteScriptVal.Add(\"ReturnText\",\"Good AppPool: ${instance} completed successfully and has a state of ${currentState}\")",
                "}",
             "} ",
             "else",
             "{",
                "Write-Output \"AppPool: ${instance} already has a state of ${desiredState} - no action required\"",
                "$remoteScriptVal.Add(\"ReturnCode\",\"1-Good\")",
                "$remoteScriptVal.Add(\"ReturnText\",\"Good App Pool: ${instance} already has a state of ${desiredState} - No action required\")",
             "}",
          "} ",
          "else",
          "{",
             "Write-Output \"AppPool: ${instance} does not exist\"",
             "$remoteScriptVal.Add(\"ReturnCode\",\"3-Error\")",
             "$remoteScriptVal.Add(\"ReturnText\",\"Error App Pool: ${instance} does not exist\")",
          "}",
          "return $remoteScriptVal"
        ]
      }
    }
  ]
}
Name: arn:aws:ssm:us-west-2:163064876642:document/CmdIisStartStop
